title: New Nocturne skin Rito...
body: Nocturne needs a new skin, his last one was released in 2012. C'mon riot please take nocturne into consideration for upcoming skins >{{champion:56}} <

replies.body:
Wait his last skin was 2012?

Fuck i have been playing this game for way too long.
I know right, makes me feel old XD

so {{champion:56}} needs new skin 2012? 
{{champion:83}} 2011
{{champion:83}} has 2 skins {{champion:56}} has 5
just saying 
how about yorick??????????????????????????????????
(and don't say who is yorick... u all know that 1/100 game where someone played him

You say "don't say who is yorick"

WHO THE FUCK IS HE???

He's the most boring ass champ in the entire game, with less mechanics than a {{champion:54}} and looks like a piece of shit that came out of {{champion:6}}'s ass

Maybe when Riot finds, and decides to rework him (joy when that day arrives), they'll give him skins. Otherwise, no point.

1/100?

it's not even a 1% play rate, so that is overestimating his play rate.
riot has already neglected him, I doubt yorick will ever get a skin{{item:3070}}

You got any skin ideas for a new nocturne Skin?
Maybe Outrageous Nocturne which makes him pink and all his abilities are pink. 
Or maybe a light/sun Nocturne skin to show the opposite of him currently
That actually sounds sick! I was hoping for a skin on April fools. They'd make his abilities pink less 'dark'
I'm still waiting to get Eternum Nocturne. Dying to get that skin for him
Best legendary skin imo. Bass drop on that ult :O
